result.arabic_text: فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ
result.translation: Nihahabwe icubahiro nta ngere Imana Allah, Umwami Aganza vyose, Nyakuri[8], nta mana ibwirijwe gusengwa atari Yo, Imana Rurema w’Ubuhangamo bwubashwe.
result.footnotes: [8] Ukubaho kwayo n’ibikomoka kuri Yo vyose, ni ukuri, nta makenga canke amazinda ari mu mazina n’amatazirano yayo, kibure mu bumana bwayo.
